Package ptolemy.domains.tdl.kernel

Class LetTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.domains.tdl.kernel.LetTask
  • public class LetTask
extends java.lang.Object
    A TTTask (time triggered task) is an actor with an invocationPeriod and a logical execution time.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 8.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Patricia Derler
